projects.title: Neural Network Chess Engine
projects.description: Neural network chess engine similar to alphazero, using convolution neural networks trained on consumer grade hardware and hosted on Google Cloud Platform.

projects.title: Digital Twin of Los Angeles
projects.description: A digital twin of Los Angeles, CA, USA, built with open data and open source tools.

projects.title: Canvas Assignments to Spreadsheets
projects.description: Compiles all assignments from all Canvas courses for a quarter into a single spreadsheet for easy organization.

projects.title: Discord Sentimental Analysis Bot
projects.description: Uses natural language processing to calculate the sentiment of a message and show the analysis of a discord server as it pertains to different keywords. Made for 12 hour hackathon at Cutiehack 2022.
